description: Leave your worries behind and check-in to your private Bungalow. This newly renovated one bedroom vintage bungalow has a cozy loft, living room, kitchen and bathroom. Open your door to a shared private courtyard. Just 2 blocks from the beach! Located in the heart of Rockaway next to the Rockaway Surf Club and walking distance from Connolly's Bar, Caracas, Bungalow Bar, Playland Motel, Rockaway Taco, Rippers, Whit's End and Rockaway Roasters .
name: Beach Bungalow with loft
review: The host canceled this reservation 47 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
